Response.Say: Thanks for the call. Zohar will be with you shortly.
If the call is unanswered, please try again later or send an email to zohar at linnovate dot net, That's Z O H A R at L I N N O V A T E dot N E T

Gather.Say: For Zohar's mobile Press 1. For Zohar's office number press 2.

Response.Say: Thanks and have a great day!
